sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya menyayangi keluarga saya.
english translation: I love my family.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kita harus menaruh respek pada orang tua.
english translation: We should respect our parents.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Semoga kamu berhasil dalam ujian.
english translation: Hopefully you will succeed in the exam.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kakiku bengkak setelah terjatuh.
english translation: My leg is swollen after falling.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya pergi ke klinik untuk periksa kesehatan.
english translation: I went to the clinic for a health check.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anak-anak perlu dilakukan imunisasi agar terhindar dari penyakit.
english translation: Children need to be immunized to prevent diseases.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya tidak suka saat disuntik.
english translation: I don't like being injected.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kakiku terkilir saat bermain sepak bola.
english translation: I sprained my leg while playing soccer.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong dibersihkan kamar mandinya.
english translation: Please clean the bathroom.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kecelakaan itu menyebabkan cedera parah.
english translation: The accident resulted in severe injuries.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anakku sedang demam, batuk pilek.
english translation: My child has a fever, cold, and cough.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kita harus menjaga kebersihan bumi ini.
english translation: We should take care of the cleanliness of this earth.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Polusi udara sangat berbahaya bagi kesehatan.
english translation: Air pollution is very harmful to health.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jangan mencemari sungai dengan sampah.
english translation: Do not pollute the river with trash.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Petani menabur benih di ladang.
english translation: The farmers sow seeds in the field.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jalan itu penuh dengan lumpur setelah hujan.
english translation: The road is full of mud after the rain.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bumi adalah salah satu planet dalam tata surya.
english translation: Earth is one of the planets in the solar system.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tumbuhan memerlukan air dan sinar matahari untuk hidup.
english translation: Plants need water and sunlight to survive.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Gempa bumi terjadi pada pukul 10 malam kemarin.
english translation: An earthquake occurred at 10 PM last night.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Rumah itu terbakar dan dipenuhi asap.
english translation: The house is on fire and filled with smoke.
